favoriteMeals.name: Cornflake Crusted French Toast
favoriteMeals.description: A crunchy and sweet twist on traditional French toast with a cornflake crust.
favoriteMeals.instructions: Dip bread slices in beaten eggs. Coat with crushed cornflakes. Cook in a skillet until golden brown. Drizzle with honey before serving.

favoriteMeals.name: Cornflake Crunch Ice Cream
favoriteMeals.description: Creamy vanilla ice cream topped with a crunchy cornflake and honey topping.
favoriteMeals.instructions: Crush cornflakes and mix with honey. Sprinkle over scoops of vanilla ice cream and enjoy.

favoriteMeals.name: Tomato and Garlic Toast
favoriteMeals.description: A simple and flavorful breakfast toast with fresh tomatoes and garlic.
favoriteMeals.instructions: Top toasted bread with sliced tomatoes and minced garlic, season with salt and pepper.

favoriteMeals.name: Cheesy Garlic Noodles
favoriteMeals.description: Comforting garlic noodles with a generous sprinkle of cheese.
favoriteMeals.instructions: In a pan, melt butter and saut√© garlic until fragrant. Add cooked noodles, salt, and pepper, toss to combine. Sprinkle cheese on top and serve hot.
